summary: A comprehensive test suite that validates the domain model's interaction with the registry, covering analyst permissions (client hold, lock, delete), automatic timestamp handling, availability checks, caching behavior, domain creation from applications, status management, expiration and renewal logic, nameserver validation rules, registrant contact handling, DNSSEC management, and related edge cases.
business_intent: Guarantee the correctness and robustness of the domain registration system by enforcing business rules, permission checks, and proper communication with the external registry, thereby reducing errors and ensuring compliance with domain management policies.
